getReadPendingIntent().Description: Gets the pending intent that Android Auto will send after it reads aloud all messages in this object's message list.

getParticipant().Description: Gets the firs participant in the conversation.

getReplyPendingIntent().Description: Gets the pending intent that will be triggered when the user replies to this notification.

getRemoteInput().Description: Gets the remote input that will be used to convey the response to a message list, or null if no such remote input exists.

getParticipants().Description: Gets the participants in the conversation.

getMessages().Description: Gets the list of messages conveyed by this notification.

getLatestTimestamp().Description: Gets the timestamp of the conversation.

ClassDesc: A class which holds the unread messages from a conversation.
